data-analytics.info: has libraries such as xgboost, lightgbm, sklearn etc.

kaggle.info: has the environment provided by kaggle

keras-tensorflow.info: has libraries for keras(v2.1.6) and tensorflow(v1.9.0) along with sklearn, opencv etc.

mxnet.info: has libraries for mxnet(v1.1.0) along with sklearn, opencv etc.

pytorch.info: has libraries for pytorch(v0.4.0) along with sklearn, opencv etc.

caffe2.info: has libraries for caffe2(v0.8.0) along with sklearn, opencv etc.

python-base.info: has base python image with no libraries installed

r-base.info: has base R image with no libraries installed. Use this environment for rstudio workspace
